page.title: 20Newspapers
page.content: Seven different local newspapers are read in our area.The Evening Mail is the only local daily paper the Westmorland Gazzete,Ulverston News,Whitehaven News and The Cumberland News are all weekly papers and the Advertiser is a free paper. Apart from the Advertiser which is a free paper the Ulverston News is most popular paper in the area with fifteen families buying it.Two families buy the Evening Mail and the Millom news and one family gets the Cumberland News. We publish our own paper at school called the Ulpha and Seathwaite Gazzete once a month and we send all the money towards the church.
